ARABIC: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَإِلَيْهِ تُقْلَبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He punishes anyone He wills and has mercy on anyone He wills. You will be returned to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Punish whom He will, and have mercy on whom He please. And to Him will you be brought back in the end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He chastises whom He will and forgives whom He will. To Him all of you will be sent back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He punishes or grants mercy to whomever He wants and to Him you will all return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He punishes whomever He wills and has mercy upon whomever He wills; and towards Him only you are to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He punishes whom He wills, and shows mercy to whom He wills; and to Him you will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He punishes whom He pleases and has mercy on whom He pleases, and to Him you shall be turned back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: chastising whom He will, and having mercy on whomsoever He will, and unto Him you shall be turned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He punisheth whom He will and showeth mercy unto whom He will, and unto Him ye will be turned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He punishes whom He will and shows mercy to whom He pleases. And to Him you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He shall torment whomsoever He Will, and shall show mercy unto whomsoever He Will, and unto Him ye shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will punish whomever He wishes and have mercy on whomever He wishes, and to Him you will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He punishes whom He pleases, and He grants Mercy to whom He pleases, and towards Him are ye turned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He punishes whom He will, and shows mercy to whom He will, and to Him you will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He punishes whom He will and has mercy to whom He will. To Him you shall be turned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He punishes whom He wills, and He grants mercy to whom He wills, and to Him you will be restored.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:21] He chastises whomever He will, to chastise, and has mercy on whomever He will, to have mercy, and to Him you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He punisheth whom He will) He makes die whoever He will as a disbeliever and thus torments him (and showeth mercy unto whom He will) and makes to die whoever He will as a believer and thus shows mercy upon him, (and unto Him ye will be turned) after death and He will reward each according to his works.
